org.efaps.db.wrapper

Class SQLUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.db.wrapper.AbstractSQLInsertUpdate<SQLUpdate>
      • org.efaps.db.wrapper.SQLUpdate

  • public class SQLUpdate
extends AbstractSQLInsertUpdate<SQLUpdate>

    An easy wrapper for a SQL update statement. To initialize this class use AbstractDatabase.newUpdate(String, String, long) to get a database specific update.

    Example:

     SQLUpdate insert = Context.getDbType().newUpdate("MYTABLE", "ID", 12);

    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

    • Constructor Detail

      • SQLUpdate

        public SQLUpdate(String _tableName,
         String _idCol,
         long _id)
        Initializes this update. Do not call the constructor directly, instead use AbstractDatabase.newUpdate(String, String, long) to get the database specific implementation.
        Parameters:
        _tableName - name of the table to update
        _idCol - name of the column with the id
        _id - id to update

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(Connection _con)
             throws SQLException
        Executes the SQL update.
        Parameters:
        _con - SQL connection
        Throws:
        SQLException - if update failed or the row for given id does not exists

      • getId

        public long getId()
        Getter method for the instance variable id.
        Returns:
        value of instance variable id
